questions.title: Most Downloaded Book
questions.content: Project Gutenberg stores classic books that are free to download in various formats. Each book has an ID. Use the API endpoint below to find the most popular book with an ID between 1 and 100. What is the exact title of that book?

questions.title: Twins But Not the Same
questions.content:
You have in hand two copies of Romeo And Juliet They are 99.99% identical and yet the difference between them will yield a secret message, enter the message below
files/twin1.txt

questions.title: Bitcoin Billionaire
questions.content:
the program below is a bitcoin exchange with real prices
If you select the buy option what value should you enter to guarantee that you will have 2000 dollars

questions.title: Money Game
questions.content:
8 Friends play a Card Trading Sim which records only play money transfers from player to player. They played for months would like to know who won. Can you take a look at the CSV file and calculate which player ended up with the most money?
NOTE: every player started with 2000 play money

questions.title: Money Game
questions.content:
8 Friends play a Card Trading Sim which records only play money transfers from player to player. They played for months would like to know who won. Can you take a look at the CSV file and calculate to two decimal points how much money the winner ended up with?
NOTE: every player started with 2000 play money

questions.title: One Link to Take You Home
questions.content:
Only one of these 200 links will bring you back to vccfinal.com which link is it?
HINT: use Python Requests

questions.title: Collatz Imposter
questions.content:
Learn about the collatz conjecture here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Collatz_conjecture
in the file below you will have Collatz sequences for the first 1000 numbers. The sequence for one number is wrong, which number is that?
1000 collatz conjectures, which one is fake.
